TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MemoryPressureFlags extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Memory pressure flags surfaced by the dispatch source.
Docs.remarks: Determins the reason for invoking a memory pressure handler, or to configure the memory pressure handler.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.CoreFoundation.MemoryPressureFlags Critical = int32(4)

summary.para: The system memory pressure condition has changed to critical.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.CoreFoundation.MemoryPressureFlags Normal = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The system memory pressure condition has returned to normal.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.CoreFoundation.MemoryPressureFlags Warn = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The system memory pressure condition has changed to warning.
